oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lawrence Welk presented the key to city from Mayor Briley, 1963 April 02
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Lawrence Welk (on left) accepting the key to the city from Nashville Mayor Briley, April 2nd, 1963. He was also awarded an Honorary Metropolitan Citizenship. Lawrence Welk was an American bandleader, musician, and television impresario, who hosted the Lawrence Welk Show from 1955 to 1982. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Welk, Lawrence, 1903-1992; Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
Entertainers--Tennessee--Nashville; Celebrities; Mayors--Tennessee--Nashville
